title: Breville -- Tips and Tricks: Gourmet Single Cup Brewer BKC700XL
description: Breville's Adèle Schober demonstrates the features and functions of the Gourmet Single Cup Brewer.

asset.author: breville

transcripts: This is the upgraded version of the Breville Gourmet single-cup Brewer with quiet Brew technology. Designe with current patented K-Cup technology, everyone can enjoy the preferred flavor of coffee tea or hot chocolate with the freshness locked into every cup. Now if I take one of these K-Cups open, you'll notice that there's a paper filter with a print size measure of coffee. This is like having a completely fresh cup of coffee guaranteed with every cake up. And because there's over two hundred varieties of K-cups, you can mix up your daily brew from K-Cup that is bold and robust or choose one of the decaf varieties. The intuitive LCD screen is simple to navigate. There are 5 preset brew sizes. Simply navigate through to select your favorite Brew size. There's also a feature for iced beverages. Fill your glass with ice, choose your flavor, and brew the 3.5 ounce shot, and just add a little bit of milk for a refreshing ice drink. This machine also comes with a K-Cup feature and that lets you brew any coffee brand of your preference. Just switch out the K-Cup place it in the storage compartment in the back. Fill up the filter basket with your favorite coffee grind using the including scoop and Brew. It's like your reusable K-Cup and for people on the go, you can take out the dripping tray so you can actually fit a travel-size mug. So to make your brew, you select your K cup, and your brew size, and then you put your K up into the chamber, cup underneath, and then just press Brew. Then you simply take the used K-Cup back and toss it away. The Gourmet single-cup Brewer another great Innovation by Breville
